verses.verse: Now there <S%H6817>cried<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> unto <S%H477>Elisha<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>; and thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> that thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> did <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> unto him my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>sons<s%> to be <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>.

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for thee? <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, what <S%H3426>hast<s%> thou in the <S%H1004>house<s%>? And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> hath not any thing in the <S%H1004>house<s%>, save a <S%H610>pot<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7592>borrow<s%> thee <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> of all thy <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, even <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%>; borrow not a <S%H4591>few<s%>.

And when thou art come <S%H935>in<s%>, thou shalt <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> upon thee and upon thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and shalt pour <S%H3332>out<s%> into all those <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and thou shalt set <S%H5265>aside<s%> that which is <S%H4392>full<s%>.

So she <S%H3212>went<s%> from him, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> upon her and <S%H1157>upon<s%> her <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H1992>who<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> the vessels to her; and she poured <S%H3332>out<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were <S%H4390>full<s%>, that she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5066>Bring<s%> me yet a <S%H3627>vessel<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, There is not a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> more. And the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%>.

Then she <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and <S%H7999>pay<s%> thy <S%H5386>debt<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%> thou and thy <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest<s%>.

¶ And it fell on a <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> to <S%H7766>Shunem<s%>, where was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>; and she <S%H2388>constrained<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>. And so it was, that as <S%H1767>oft<s%> as he passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, he <S%H5493>turned<s%> in thither to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H376>husband<s%>, Behold now, I <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that this is an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which <S%H5674>passeth<s%> by us <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5944>chamber<s%>, I pray thee, on the <S%H7023>wall<s%>; and let us <S%H7760>set<s%> for him there a <S%H4296>bed<s%>, and a <S%H7979>table<s%>, and a <S%H3678>stool<s%>, and a <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>: and it shall be, when he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to us, that he shall <S%H5493>turn<s%> in thither.
And it fell on a <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he <S%H935>came<s%> thither, and he <S%H5493>turned<s%> into the <S%H5944>chamber<s%>, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> there.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> this <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%>. And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H559>Say<s%> now unto her, Behold, thou hast been <S%H2729>careful<s%> for us with all this <S%H2731>care<s%>; what is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for thee? <S%H3426>wouldest<s%> thou be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, or to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>? And she <S%H559>answered<s%>, I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> mine own <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What then is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for her? And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H61>Verily<s%> she hath no <S%H1121>child<s%>, and her <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H2204>old<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> her. And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, About this <S%H4150>season<s%>, according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, thou shalt <S%H2263>embrace<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>. And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Nay, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, do not <S%H3576>lie<s%> unto thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> at that <S%H4150>season<s%> that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> unto her, according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>.
¶ And when the <S%H3206>child<s%> was <S%H1431>grown<s%>, it fell on a <S%H3117>day<s%>, that he went <S%H3318>out<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H7114>reapers<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%>, My <S%H7218>head<s%>, my <S%H7218>head<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to a <S%H5288>lad<s%>, <S%H5375>Carry<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother<s%>.
And when he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother<s%>, he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees<s%> till <S%H6672>noon<s%>, and then <S%H4191>died<s%>.
And she went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4296>bed<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the door upon him, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>.

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> unto her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7971>Send<s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H259>one<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H860>asses<s%>, that I may <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and come <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore wilt thou <S%H1980>go<s%> to him to <S%H3117>day<s%>? it is neither new <S%H2320>moon<s%>, nor <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>. And she <S%H559>said<s%>, It shall be <S%H7965>well<s%>.

Then she <S%H2280>saddled<s%> an <S%H860>ass<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H5090>Drive<s%>, and go <S%H3212>forward<s%>; <S%H6113>slack<s%> not thy <S%H7392>riding<s%> for me, except I <S%H559>bid<s%> thee.

So she <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>. And it came to pass, when the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> saw her afar <S%H7200>off<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, Behold, yonder is <S%H1975>that<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%>:

<S%H7323>Run<s%> now, I pray thee, to <S%H7125>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto her, Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with thee? is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with thy <S%H376>husband<s%>? is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H3206>child<s%>? And she <S%H559>answered<s%>, It is <S%H7965>well<s%>.

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill<s%>, she <S%H2388>caught<s%> him by the <S%H7272>feet<s%>: but <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> to thrust her <S%H1920>away<s%>. And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let her <S%H7503>alone<s%>; for her <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4843>vexed<s%> within her: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5956>hid<s%> it from me, and hath not <S%H5046>told<s%> me.
Then she <S%H559>said<s%>, Did I <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>? did I not <S%H559>say<s%>, Do not <S%H7952>deceive<s%> me?

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%>, Gird <S%H2296>up<s%> thy <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and go thy <S%H3212>way<s%>: if thou <S%H4672>meet<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H1288>salute<s%> him not; and if <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H1288>salute<s%> thee, answer him not <S%H6030>again<s%>: and <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%>.

And the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, and as thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> thee. And he <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212%H310>followed<s%> her.

And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> passed <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4938>staff<s%> upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%>; but there was neither <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor <S%H7182>hearing<s%>. Wherefore he went <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H5288>child<s%> is not <S%H6974>awaked<s%>.
And when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>, behold, the <S%H5288>child<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> upon his <S%H4296>bed<s%>.
He went <S%H935>in<s%> therefore, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> upon them <S%H8147>twain<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> upon the <S%H3206>child<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> upon his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and his <S%H3709>hands<s%> upon his <S%H3709>hands<s%>: and he <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself upon the child; and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> waxed <S%H2552>warm<s%>.

Then he <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H259%H2008>to<s%> and <S%H259%H2008>fro<s%>; and went <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself upon him: and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H2237>sneezed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> this <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%>. So he <S%H7121>called<s%> her. And when she was come <S%H935>in<s%> unto him, he <S%H559>said<s%>, Take <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>.

Then she went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> at his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> herself to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and took <S%H5375>up<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>.

¶ And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> came <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>: and there was a <S%H7458>dearth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5288>servant<s%>, <S%H8239>Set<s%> on the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5518>pot<s%>, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> <S%H5138>pottage<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

And <S%H259>one<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H219>herbs<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> thereof <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H6498>gourds<s%> his <S%H899>lap<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6398>shred<s%> them into the <S%H5518>pot<s%> of <S%H5138>pottage<s%>: for they <S%H3045>knew<s%> them not.

So they poured <S%H3332>out<s%> for the <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>. And it came to pass, as they were <S%H398>eating<s%> of the <S%H5138>pottage<s%>, that they cried <S%H6817>out<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O thou <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, there is <S%H4194>death<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot<s%>. And they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

But he <S%H559>said<s%>, Then <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H7058>meal<s%>. And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H5518>pot<s%>; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Pour <S%H3332>out<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%>. And there was no <S%H1697%H7451>harm<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot<s%>.

¶ And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H1190>Baal-shalisha<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and full ears of <S%H3759>corn<s%> in the <S%H6861>husk<s%> thereof. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%>.

And his <S%H8334>servitor<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What, should I <S%H5414>set<s%> this <S%H6440>before<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>? He said <S%H559>again<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%>: for thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, They shall <S%H398>eat<s%>, and shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> thereof.
So he <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H3498>left<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
